entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
